filecoin_growth_impact: Operated MetaEra Flash News, a daily ecosystem update service covering Filecoin, IPFS, and FVM activities.
description:
Since 2023, MetaEra has continuously produced bilingual news, interviews, and campaigns that connect Filecoin builders, SPs, and community members across Asia and beyond.
It plays a central role in making Filecoin accessible to new audiences, driving education, visibility, and cross-community engagement.
end_user:
Filecoin community members and SPs — receive accessible, accurate ecosystem information.
Developers and projects — gain visibility through interviews and media exposure.
General Web3 audiences — learn about Filecoin’s use cases and technology through engaging storytelling.
testimonials: ecosystem builders, community leads, and Filecoin Foundation collaborators
impressions: about 20 flash news and articles for fil
graduations_or_event_attendees: Our online & offline ama targted >5,000 people for Fil
